randomItem.name: :question: **A random item**
randomItem.info: :warning: You will recieve a random item (Weapon / Armor / Misc or Potion) among all those existing in the game. If you already have an item of higher value than the one created, you will recieve a small monetary compensation.

healAlterations.name: :hospital: **Heal alterations**
healAlterations.info: :warning: Your status will be reset and the next report will be available in an hour.

regen.name: :heartpulse: **Complete health regeneration**
regen.info: :warning: You will be fully healed but your status will stay unchanged.

badge.name: :money_mouth: **"MoneyMouth" Badge**
badge.info: :warning: You will receive the badge in the hours following your payment. For more information on badges, use the command `help badges`
